name: Amexio D3-chart multiseries
description: An  D3-chart multiseries  chart that is rendered within the browser using SVG .Displays tips when hovering over points.

properties.name: legend
properties.description: Sets legend to D3 multiseries bar chart

legend.name: onLegendClick()
legend.description: It will fire only on click on Legend Click in D3 multiseries chart .

chartevent.name: onChartClick()
chartevent.description: It will fire only on click on chart in D3 multiseries chart .
